xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 8 Pītittika » 8.7 Pañhāvāra » 8.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 8.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhārādi
Pītittika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhārādi
44.
760Pītisahagato dhammo pītisahagatassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo…  indriyapaccayena paccayo…  jhānapaccayena paccayo…  maggapaccayena paccayo…  sampayuttapaccayena paccayo…  atthipaccayena paccayo…  (dasa pañhā vitthāretabbā) natthipaccayena paccayo…  vigatapaccayena paccayo…  (natthipi vigatampi anantarasadisaṃ) avigatapaccayena paccayo.
<< Vipākaup8.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra >>
